overview: A comprehensive roadmap aligned with current job market demands. Covers modern frameworks, performance optimization, testing, and specialization paths.

steps.title: Foundations (HTML, CSS, JS)
steps.description: Master the fundamentals with a focus on accessibility and clean code practices.

steps.title: Advanced JavaScript
steps.description: Learn ES6+, async/await, promises, closures, event loop, modules.

steps.title: Modern CSS Techniques
steps.description: CSS variables, animations, transitions, SCSS/SASS, TailwindCSS.

steps.title: Frontend Frameworks
steps.description: Focus on React (industry leader). Learn hooks, state management, routing.

steps.title: TypeScript
steps.description: Adopt TypeScript for better scalability, type safety, and enterprise use.

steps.title: API Integration
steps.description: Work with REST APIs and GraphQL. Learn data fetching, authentication, and error handling.

steps.title: State Management
steps.description: Learn Redux, Context API, Zustand or Recoil for managing global state.

steps.title: Testing & Quality Assurance
steps.description: Unit testing, integration testing, end-to-end testing with Jest, React Testing Library, Cypress.

steps.title: Build Tools & Deployment
steps.description: Learn Webpack, Vite, CI/CD basics, deployment on Vercel/Netlify.

steps.title: Performance Optimization
steps.description: Lazy loading, code splitting, Core Web Vitals, caching strategies.

steps.title: Soft Skills & Career Prep
steps.description: DSA basics for interviews, system design fundamentals, portfolio building.

steps.title: Specialization Paths (Optional)
steps.description: Pick a specialization: Next.js (Fullstack), React Native (Mobile), or Three.js (Web Graphics).

steps.title: Capstone Project
steps.description: Build a production-ready app (e.g., e-commerce site, SaaS dashboard) and deploy.
